Name: Professional Thief
About the game: Professional Thief - a first person stealth simulator where you play the role of a burglar and are supposed to rob a house. The main goal is to find a specific amount of money in the house and leave without being seen by the owners or their guests. However, robbing a house is not an easy taskâ€¦
